name: ButterFighters
description:
ButterFighters is an arena shooter where everyone is too clumsy to keep a hold of their guns. Fight to the death with one other player in local multiplayer, trying your hardest to get off an accurate shot before you scramble to pick up another weapon.

Play with a friend with two controllers. Designed for the Xbox 360 controller in Unity.

This early version of the game was released for Ludum Dare 37 but we're continuing development for a full release with online play and extra weapons.
